name: Dell Inspiron 15 Laptop
short_description: Dell Inspiron 15 laptop with 12th Gen Intel Core i5, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and Windows 11.
long_description: The Dell Inspiron 15 is a powerful yet lightweight laptop designed for productivity and everyday use. It features a 12th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB DDR4 RAM, and 512GB SSD storage for fast performance. The 15.6-inch Full HD display delivers crisp visuals, while Windows 11 ensures a modern computing experience. Perfect for students, professionals, and home users.
